org.lucee.extension.orm.hibernate.event

Class EventListenerIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lucee.extension.orm.hibernate.event.EventListenerIntegrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.hibernate.event.spi.AutoFlushEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.ClearEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.DeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.DirtyCheckEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.EvictEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.FlushEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostDeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostInsertEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostLoadEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostUpdateEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreDeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreInsertEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreLoadEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreUpdateEventListener, org.hibernate.integrator.spi.Integrator

    public class EventListenerIntegrator
extends Object
implements org.hibernate.integrator.spi.Integrator, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreInsertEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostInsertEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreDeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostDeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.DeleteEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreUpdateEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostUpdateEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PreLoadEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.PostLoadEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.FlushEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.AutoFlushEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.ClearEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.DirtyCheckEventListener, org.hibernate.event.spi.EvictEventListener
    Integrate Hibernate events with the EventHandler and component listener UDFs. For example, a postInsert() method in a User entity will be invoked prior to the entity's insertion into the database. This same method will also be invoked on the EventHandler component, if configured.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setGlobalEventListener

        public void setGlobalEventListener(lucee.runtime.Component GlobalEventListener)
        Set the "Global" EventHandler to fire on all events in the application.
        Parameters:
        GlobalEventListener - Instantiated Lucee Component object.

      • appendEventListenerCFC

        public void appendEventListenerCFC(lucee.runtime.Component cfc)
        Add this component to the list of listeners to be notified for an entity event.

        Note this listener will ONLY fire for events related to itself. i.e. Car.preInsert will be run for Car entity preInsert events - not for User entity preInsert events.

        Parameters:
        cfc - Instantiated Lucee Component object.

      • getGlobalEventListener

        public lucee.runtime.Component getGlobalEventListener()
        Retrieve the configured "Global" event listener. i.e., the Component configured in `this.ormSettings.eventHandler`.
        Returns:
        The configured Component to use as this application's event handler.

      • fireEventOnGlobalListener

        public void fireEventOnGlobalListener(lucee.runtime.type.Collection.Key name,
                                      Object entity,
                                      org.hibernate.event.spi.AbstractEvent event,
                                      lucee.runtime.type.Struct data)
        Fire the event listener UDF on the configured global EventHandler listener.

        If no global event handler is configured, will exit.

        Parameters:
        name - event type name to fire, for example "preInsert" or "preDelete"
        entity - the entity from event.getEntity()
        event - the Hibernate event object.
        data - A struct of data to pass to the event

      • fireEventOnEntityListener

        public void fireEventOnEntityListener(lucee.runtime.Component listener,
                                      lucee.runtime.type.Collection.Key name,
                                      org.hibernate.event.spi.AbstractEvent event,
                                      lucee.runtime.type.Struct data)
        Fire the event listener UDF, if found, on the entity component
        Parameters:
        listener - the Lucee Component on which to fire this listener method
        name - event type name to fire, for example "preInsert" or "preDelete"
        event - the Hibernate event object.
        data - A struct of data to pass to the event

      • componentHasMethod

        public static boolean componentHasMethod(lucee.runtime.Component comp,
                                         lucee.runtime.type.Collection.Key methodName)
        See if the given component has a method matching the given name.
        Parameters:
        comp - Lucee Component to look on, for example events.EventHandler.
        methodName - Method name to look for, for example "preInsert"
        Returns:
        true if method found
